data.title: About
data.meta_description: Samantha, Melissa and Penny are  teachers at Ringwood Secondary College and have developed this website to implement curriculum material for VCE Media, Year 9-10 Media and Year 9 Photography.
data.text:
About the creators

Samantha, Melissa and Penny are teachers at Ringwood Secondary College and have developed this website to implement curriculum material for VCE Media, Year 9-10 Media and Year 9 Photography.

Samantha Asbury

B.ARTS (JOURNALISM) / DIP.ED. (SECONDARY)

Samantha Asbury has been teaching at Ringwood Secondary College since 2010 and has taught Media, Photography, Digital Citizenship, English, Art, Visual Communication and Design, VCAL and Bounce during this time.

​Responsibilities have included: Learning Specialist - Digital Learning (2018-2021), Junior School Coordinator (2016-2017), Media / IT Coordinator (2012-2015), VCAL Coordinator (2011).

Melissa Müller

B.Fine Arts (Photography) / Dip.Ed (Primary/Secondary) / Dip. Applied Photography

Melissa Müller has been teaching Media and Art since 2008. She joined Ringwood Secondary College in 2012 and currently teaches Media, Photography, Art and Visual Communication.

Responsibilities have included: Head of Arts (2021), Environmental Leader (2012), College Magazine Coordinator (2008-2011).

Penelope Palmer

B. Arts (Media/English) / B. Education (Secondary)

Penny Palmer has been teaching at Ringwood Secondary College since 2014, teaching Media, English, Photography, Art and Visual Communication.

Responsibilities have included: Head of Visual Arts (2016), Treasurer for Staff Association (2015-16).
